column4: hey will ubuntu automatically detect my winXP partition and setup a dual boot installation for me? im a lil scared that its going to overwrite everthing
it won't resize the windows partition automatically, but it will setup dual boot just fine
You'll have to manually resize the partition, Ubuntu will give instructions on that. It's usually safe (but backups are always welcome).
that I really don't know. Have you tried the ubuntuguide.org?
